about.title: About Me
about.name: Br√©val Le Floch
about.description1: I'm a work-study student living in Nantes. From my youngest age, I am very fascinated by the infinite possibilities of computers and new technologies.
about.description2: As I continue to learn and explore this ever-evolving universe, I'm driven by my passion to discover new worlds and their new rules. Currently focused on front-end development while maintaining a deep interest in all aspects of computer science.
